attributes.action: Dramatically “Reduce” the amount of VAT on fuel to help lower inflation and avoid a recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign our petition to put pressure on the Government to lower the amount VAT it adds to fuel, Gordon Brown states that the cartel known as Opec are the ones responsible for the cost of fuel at the pumps and they are the one who need to reduce the price to make it more affordable! 

What he does not mention, however, is the amount of extra money he’s raking in from the addition VAT due to the higher price. 

If you cannot show your support here, please show it at the next general election!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
